Posted By: Biems (4/4/2010 7:01:01 PM)

posts.post_content:
One good synergy would be using this with other lands that profit from Swamps like [Cabal Coffers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cabal Coffers), or the [Tainted](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tainted) cycle for multicolored decks.  
Or you could use [Filth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Filth) to make your creatures unblockable.  
And you'll have some suicide fun if you combine this one by spashing white with [Stern Judge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stern Judge), or even [Karma](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Karma) if you are able to reverse the damage.  
[Kormus Bell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kormus Bell) would turn every land into 1/1 creatures with that tomb - possibly you'd then also like using [Goblin Sharpshooter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Sharpshooter) with this one as well to cause a one-sided [Armageddon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armageddon).  
And this card can of course turn any Lands that do not produce mana into useful mana accel.  
The latest and likely most effective use of this card for example, as aforementioned by Pantheon, is playing this on turn one in order to play [Dark Depths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Depths) and immediately [Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire ) ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
One good synergy would be using this with other lands that profit from Swamps like Cabal Coffers, or the Tainted cycle for multicolored decks.
Or you could use Filth to make your creatures unblockable.
And you'll have some suicide fun if you combine this one by spashing white with Stern Judge, or even Karma if you are able to reverse the damage.
Kormus Bell would turn every land into 1/1 creatures with that tomb - possibly you'd then also like using Goblin Sharpshooter with this one as well to cause a one-sided Armageddon.
And this card can of course turn any Lands that do not produce mana into useful mana accel.
The latest and likely most effective use of this card for example, as aforementioned by Pantheon, is playing this on turn one in order to play Dark Depths and immediately Vampire ... (see all)

posts.post_content: It mostly made [tendrils of corruption](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=tendrils of corruption) a tournament card as well as letting you put [Korlash, heir to blackblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Korlash, heir to blackblade) into multicolored decks. As for the helping your opponents thing, that is very unimportant. What is bad though is that it is legendary so If you topdeck another one, you better have a good discard card. Also your if your opponent is a mean little gremlin, he will use [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva) to [Strip mine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Strip mine) it.
